scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Annunciation. On the left, the Virgin Mary, clad in a blue mantle and pink undergarment, stands with her hands clasped in a gesture of humility and acceptance. Her halo is gold. To her right, the Angel Gabriel, with green wings and wearing a pink robe adorned with gold patterns, kneels and presents a scroll inscribed with Latin text. A vase containing white lilies, a symbol of purity, sits between them on the grassy ground. Above and to the right, a bust of God the Father, with a golden halo and beard, is depicted within a blue celestial sphere dotted with stars. The background is a decorative tapestry of interlocking blue and gold diamonds.
